subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Byers died last week at the age of 93, but his legacy as the first executive director of the N.C.A.A. resonates in virtually every aspect of intercollegiate athletics.
snippet: Byers died last week at the age of 93, but his legacy as the first executive director of the N.C.A.A. resonates in virtually every aspect of intercollegiate athletics.
